RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 65. Claiming Purse 13500. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 9 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since August 9 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: UNCAPTURED LYON bore in bumping UNCAPTURED LYON at the start, sprinted to the lead along the inside, set all the pace, widened into the stretch and won under left handed urging. ALTAIR was bumped between horses at the start, stalked the early pace and finished determinedly in the three path to be well clear for second. DOMI bore out at the start bumping ALTAIR, saved ground and closed a gap late. ESTILO CLASICO well placed, failed to respond. KRAZY HAWK was bumped between horses at the start and passed tiring rivals in deep stretch. MINDSHIP Q had brief speed outside. LOCKDOWN LOVER pressed the pace two wide into the stretch then weakened. FEVER DREAM was through early.

ENTRY.NAME: Domi
ENTRY.COMMENT: bore out, bumped start, saved ground, belatedly

ENTRY.NAME: Altair
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped between horses start, stalked pace, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Krazy Hawk
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped between horses start, passed tiring rivals,

ENTRY.NAME: Uncaptured Lyon
ENTRY.COMMENT: bore in, bumped start, rushed to lead, set pace, drew off,

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: John David O'Farrell & J. MichaelO'Farrell, Jr. & William

ENTRY.NAME: Lockdown Lover
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Estilo Clasico
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed, failed to respond,

ENTRY.NAME: Fever Dream
ENTRY.COMMENT: through early,

ENTRY.NAME: Mindship Q
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief speed outside

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 2 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 71. Claiming Purse 21900. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO FOALS THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE IN 2023. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 9 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since August 9 Allowed 4 lb s. Claiming Price $16,000 (Claiming Races For $7,500 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: THAT'S THE WAY trailed into the stretch, closed fast four wide while splitting rivals through deep stretch and got up in the final strides. SURROUNDER pressed the pace three wide into the stretch, gained a narrow lead late then couldn't handle the late charge of the winner. NAMBITI stalked the pace into the stretch, loomed boldly along the rail nearing the furlong marker then was outfinished. FIRSTHAND JUSTICE never far back, inched closer four wide through the turn then failed to sustain that bid. WHAT A RUSH broke in front, set a pressured pace in the two path until deep stretch and weakened late.

ENTRY.NAME: Nambiti
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, loomed boldly inside, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Firsthand Justice
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, 4 wide, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Surrounder
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 3 wide, led late, gained second

ENTRY.NAME: That's the Way
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, closed with a rush, 4 wide, up in final strides,

ENTRY.NAME: What a Rush
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, set pressured pace 2path, weakened late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 3 1M Dirt CR: 78. Claiming Purse 12200. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE OCTOBER 9, 2022. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since September 9 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since August 9 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MAYTHEHORSEBWITHU prompted the pace two wide into the far turn, made the lead then widened the balance of the trip to win going away while being ridden out. CANDY CRUSHEM unhurried early, rallied along the rail into the stretch and finished clear for second. OWN THE TOWN trailed into the stretch and improved position four wide. ARTEMUS EAGLE stalked the pace three wide into the stretch then faded. NOBLE BEHAVIOR was hustled along to set the pace along the inside into the far turn then was used up.

ENTRY.NAME: Maythehorsebwithu
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed 2 wide, perfect trip, drew off, ridden out,

ENTRY.NAME: Artemus Eagle
ENTRY.OWNER: Nana's Nest and Cline Robert C
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, 3 wide, faded lane

ENTRY.NAME: Noble Behavior
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled along, set pace inside 2nd turn, used up,

ENTRY.NAME: Own the Town
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, improved position, 4 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Candy Crushem
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, late rally, inside, second best,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 64. Claiming Purse 17400. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE APRIL 9. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: OHIO MUNNY matched stride for the lead along the rail into the stretch, shook clear under left handed urging and lasted under strong handling. PLATE IT UP allowed to settle, closed rapidly in the four path through deep stretch and finished clear for second. JACK BE FAST battled with the winner two wide for a half then was outfinished. JOES A ROCKIN inside, went evenly. OHIO PLAYER hopped at the start, raced wide and was no threat. ROLLIN ON TEQUILA stalked the pace two wide into the stretch and gave way late. THE STEWARDS POSTED THE INQUIRY SIGN BUT TOOK NO ACTION.

ENTRY.NAME: Ohio Munny
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled inside drew clear, left handed urging, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Joes a Rockin
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside, evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Rollin On Tequila
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, 2 wide, gave way late

ENTRY.NAME: Jack Be Fast
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled 2 wide, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Ohio Player
ENTRY.COMMENT: hopped start, wide trip, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Plate It Up
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, closed fast 4path, clear 2nd

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 5 1M Dirt CR: 84. Claiming Purse 27500. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since September 9 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since August 9 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SERVE REVENGE COLD set the pace along the inside, was headed by the runner up at the three sixteenths pole, fought back gamely under left handed urging brushing that one late and proved best in a game effort. GOLD N SILVER pressed the pace two wide to the top of the stretch, gained a narrow lead, was brushed by the winner late and finished second best. RUMBLE STRIP RON stalked the pace along the inside and went evenly. VISUAL MISSION moved closer three wide before a half then failed to sustain that bid. SEND ME ON trailed. THE RIDER OF GOLD N SILVER LODGED A CLAIM OF FOUL AGAINST THE RIDER OF THE WINNER FOR ALLEGED INTERFERENCE IN DEEP STRETCH. AFTER REVIEW THE STEWARDS UPHELD THE ORIGINAL ORDER OF FINISH.

ENTRY.NAME: Visual Mission
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, 3 wide, failed to sustain bid,

ENTRY.NAME: Serve Revenge Cold
ENTRY.OWNER: Urieta Racing Stable and Sadey David
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside lead, headed, brushed late, fought back gamely

ENTRY.NAME: Rumble Strip Ron
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace inside, evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Send Me On
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed,

ENTRY.NAME: Gold N Silver
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, led lane, brushed late, jockey claimed foul

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 57. Claiming Purse 13500. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 9 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since August 9 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JUMP INTO SANITY prompted the pace two wide into the stretch, gained a narrow lead before the furlong marker then responded under mild right handed urging to draw off while full of run and won as much the best. BELLAVALENCIA was taken outside soon after the start, had a mild late rally in the six path and got up for second. KRISTIN broke in front, set the pace into the stretch then was outfinished. FLASH OF CHEROKEE vied for the lead three wide into the stretch then faded.

ENTRY.NAME: Bellavalencia
ENTRY.COMMENT: outside trip, mild rally, up place

ENTRY.NAME: Jump Into Sanity
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, full of run, much the best,

ENTRY.NAME: Flash of Cherokee
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead, 3 wide, fade lane

ENTRY.NAME: Kristin
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, set pace upper stretch, outfinished

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 7 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 63. Claiming Purse 21900. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO FOALS FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE IN 2023. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 9 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since Au gust 9 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000 (Claiming Races For $7,500 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: EXPRESS FASHION chased the leader into the stretch, was carried out to the middle of the racetrack by that one past the three sixteenths pole, made the lead late and prevailed under strong handling. FABULOUS CLOWN broke inward bumping BEAUTIFUL LASS at the start, trailed through the turn, closed willingly along the inside through the stretch and just missed getting up in time. BEAUTIFUL LASS was bumped at the start, sprinted to a daylight lead soon thereafter, set the pace into the stretch, drifted out to the middle of the racetrack and weakened in the final furlong. KISSTHECROSS failed to menace.

ENTRY.NAME: Beautiful Lass
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, sprinted clear, drifted mid track top lane,weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Fabulous Clown
ENTRY.OWNER: R and P Racing Stables, LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, trailed, closed willingly, inside, missed,

ENTRY.NAME: Express Fashion
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, carried out mid track, late lead, lasted, left urging

ENTRY.NAME: Kissthecross
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 61. Maiden Claiming Purse 13100. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ESTILO FAVORITO broke in full stride to set all the pace unchallenged and won as much the best while being ridden out. EL BANDIDO bore in at the start, was unhurried early, rallied late in the four path and finished clear for second. INSACIABLE PRINCE was forced in bumping HEART OF AN ANGEL at the start, trailed into the stretch and found his best stride late in the six path. GIZMO'S MISSION chased the winner from the two path and faded late. HEART OF AN ANGEL was bumped at the start and no threat. ANGEL'S SOUPERSTAR was no factor. FAIR TO MIDDLIN stalked the pace into the tunr, got out entering the stretch and stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Angel's Souperstar
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Gizmo's Mission
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2path, faded lane

ENTRY.NAME: Heart of an Angel
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Insaciable Prince
ENTRY.COMMENT: forced in, bumped start, trailed, late gain 6path

ENTRY.NAME: El Bandido
ENTRY.COMMENT: bore in, start, late rally 4path, clear second

ENTRY.NAME: Fair to Middlin
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, got out entering stretch. stopped,

ENTRY.NAME: Estilo Favorito
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, led throughout, unchallenged, ridden out,
